title: March of the Deathless Dead
description:
LibriVox volunteers bring you 8 recordings of March of the Deathless Dead by Abram Joseph Ryan.
This was the Fortnightly Poetry project for October 27, 2024.
------
Abram Joseph Ryan was an American poet, Catholic priest, Catholic newspaper editor, orator, and former Vincentian. Historians disagree on whether Ryan served as a military chaplain for the Confederate States of America. He has been called the "Poet-Priest of the South" and the "Poet Laureate of the Confederacy". - Summary by Wikipedia
